item.title: Garrett gets sack No. 23 to set NFL season record
item.description: Browns defensive end Myles Garrett set the NFL's single-season sack record Sunday with a sack of Joe Burrow to give him 23 on the season.

item.title: Titans QB Ward's season ends with hurt shoulder
item.description: Titans quarterback Cam Ward left the season finale at Jacksonville after landing on his right shoulder on a touchdown run.

item.title: Ravens-Steelers winner takes AFC North: 'Going to be a slugfest'
item.description: For years, this feud has become must-watch TV, and Sunday won't be any different in a "winner-takes-all" game.
